name: Zombies In Space (Obsessor13)
description: Welcome to Zombies In Space! My first ever video game in my first ever game jam! I already know that there are a lot of issues and bugs and just plain lack of functionality. Although I can definitely say I have learned a lot throughout the week of this game jam. I do hope you enjoy the concept and wacky physics regardless. Thanks for the opportunity and I hope to take part in more jams in the future. (With hopefully better games)
